home.title: CharTii-i18n
home.description: Translate multilingual project language packs with AI, supporting OpenAI, Gemini, DeepSeek, and other mainstream models.
home.how_it_works_description: Create a project and set the path to the source-language JSON file. The system scans the language-pack directory, identifies target locales based on filenames (e.g., zh.json, fr.json). Press the "Start Translation" button, and the system will automatically generate or overwrite the corresponding language-pack files.

projects.title: Projects
projects.no_projects: No projects yet. Click "Create Project" to get started.

create_modal.title: Create New Project
create_modal.source_path_help_create: Use the absolute path on your machine.
create_modal.source_path_help_create2: All translations will be based on this source file. This file will not be modified.
create_modal.source_path_help_edit: Do not modify unless the project's language pack path has changed. Changing the source language file path may cause translation errors.
create_modal.source_path_required: Please provide a valid source file path.
create_modal.context_placeholder: Briefly describe the project and how the language pack is used.
create_modal.context_help: Give the AI enough context about the application so it can produce accurate translations.
create_modal.import_mode_retranslate_desc: Ignore existing translation files, use AI to translate everything
create_modal.import_mode_merge_desc: Import translations from existing language files (e.g., zh.json, fr.json)
create_modal.import_mode_help: Choose "Import existing" to keep existing translations and avoid overwriting your language files.

messages.delete_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

This action cannot be undone.
messages.validation_required: Please fill in the required fields before submitting.
messages.validation_absolute_path: The source file path must be an absolute path (e.g. /app/locales/en.json or C:\Projects\app\locales\en.json).

overview.title: Project Overview

language_progress.title: Language Progress
language_progress.description: Completion overview for each target language.

pages_table.title: Pages & Key Density
pages_table.description: Grouped by the first segment of each key path.
pages_table.no_pages_detected: No pages detected. Keys will appear once the source pack is synced.

overview.add_translation_files: Add translation files to enable target languages.

manual.title: Manual Translation
manual.description: Add keys with manually approved translations here. Once saved and locked, these entries will be skipped during AI translation.
manual.select_languages_title: Select target languages for manual translation.
manual.search_placeholder: Search by key or source text

worklist.title: Manual Translation List
worklist.empty: Add keys and languages to start manual translation.

manual.no_translations_found: No translations found for this key.
manual.select_key_to_load: Select a key to load translations.
manual.no_key_selected: No key selected. Please try again.
manual.select_at_least_one_language: Select at least one target language.
manual.select_at_least_one_language_to_update: Select at least one language to update.
manual.select_key_before_saving: Select a key before saving translations.

protected.title: Protected Terms
protected.description: Terms listed here remain unchanged during automatic translation. Use categories to group brand names, technical jargon, or code identifiers. URLs are never translated.
protected.enable_switch: Enable protected terms for this project

add_term.title: Add Protected Term
add_term.description: Create protected terms manually or use the analyzer to detect candidates from your project.
add_term.term_help: Enter text you do not want to be translated automatically, such as words, phrases, or sentences.
add_term.key_scopes_help: Select key paths where this term should be protected.

list.title: Protected Term List
list.footer: Changes are saved automatically when you add or modify terms.

suggestions_modal.title: Suggested Protected Terms
suggestions_modal.description: Review and select which terms to add to the protected list. Suggestions are generated from existing source content.
suggestions_modal.empty: Run the analyzer to see suggestions.

protected.term_merged: Term already exists, key scopes merged.
protected.term_id_not_found: Term ID not found. Please reload the page.
protected.no_keys_found: No keys found. Sync the source file first.
protected.modal_unavailable: Bootstrap modal unavailable; cannot show suggestions.
protected.terms_added: {count} term{plural} added to the protected list.{skipped}
protected.all_terms_exist: All {count} term{plural} already exist in the protected list.

translate.provider_help: Select the AI provider to use for translation.
translate.words_per_batch_help: Maximum number of words per translation batch. English counts by spaces, Chinese/Japanese/Korean counts by characters.
translate.strategy_missing_and_ai: Retranslate AI-generated entries & fill missing ones
translate.strategy_validate: Validate translated keys and clear invalid translations
translate.full_warning: This will overwrite ALL existing translations.
translate.confirm_understand: I understand that this action cannot be undone

messages.language_completed_with_tokens: {languageName} translation completed. Translated: {total}, Succeeded: {successCount}, Failed: {failureCount}, Token In/Out: {inputTokens} / {outputTokens}
messages.job_expired: Translation job expired or not found. Please start a new translation.
messages.source_synced_no_changes: Source file synced. No changes detected.
messages.please_select_at_least_one_key: Please select at least one key.

wizard.title: Start Translation
wizard.step1_title: Step 1: Select AI Provider and Languages
wizard.provider_help: Choose which AI provider to use for this translation job.
wizard.select_languages_help: Choose which languages to translate. Languages marked as 100% complete can still be retranslated.
wizard.strategy_missing_desc: New translations will only be generated for keys that are currently missing. Existing translations (including locked ones) are kept.
wizard.strategy_ai_desc: Existing translations with status "ai_translated" may be overwritten. Locked/manual translations are kept.
wizard.strategy_full_desc: All existing translations for the selected languages will be replaced, including locked/manual entries. This cannot be undone.
wizard.confirm_full: I understand that all existing translations for the selected languages will be overwritten.
wizard.include_locked_help: Only applicable for full retranslate mode.
wizard.regenerate_files: Regenerate target language files after translation

failed_keys_modal.title: Failed Translation Keys
failed_keys_modal.description: Add Keys to protected terms or click "Set as Correct" to prevent translation errors. Protected terms stay unchanged across all languages, while "Set as Correct" saves verified translations to the database, avoiding false errors when source and target words are identical (e.g., English → German).

api.provider_help: Select the AI provider to use for translations.
api.api_key_help: Your {provider} API key. Keep it secure.

new_provider.title: New AI Provider
new_provider.name_help: Enter a unique name for your custom AI provider (letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores only).
new_provider.name_invalid: Provider name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.

general.log_mode_help: Control detailed translation logging. Debug mode logs full prompts and API payloads.

messages.save_failed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
messages.load_failed: Failed to load settings. Please refresh the page.
messages.provider_deleted: Provider "{name}" deleted. Remember to save settings.
messages.provider_exists: A provider with this name already exists.
messages.provider_name_invalid: Provider name can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
messages.api_url_required_custom: Custom provider requires an API URL.
messages.api_key_required_custom: Custom provider requires an API key.
messages.select_provider: Please select a translation API provider.
messages.logs_clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all logs? This action cannot be undone.
messages.delete_provider_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the provider "{name}"?

errors.page_not_found_message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
errors.unexpected_error_occurred: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

errors.invalid_languages: languages must be a list of language codes
errors.invalid_mode: Invalid mode: {mode}. Must be one of: missing_only, missing_and_ai, full, validate_only
errors.chunk_size_min: Words per batch must be at least 100
errors.chunk_size_max: Words per batch must be at most 10000
errors.chunk_size_invalid: Words per batch must be a valid integer
errors.job_cannot_cancel: Job cannot be cancelled (already finished or not found)
errors.job_does_not_belong: Job does not belong to this project
errors.validation_not_json: File is not a JSON file
errors.project_summary_too_long: Project summary must be 1000 characters or less
errors.language_detection_failed: Cannot detect language from filename. Filename should be in format: <language_code>.json
errors.file_not_exists: File does not exist at the specified path
errors.path_not_file: Path exists but is not a file
errors.file_must_be_json: File must be a JSON file (.json)
errors.file_not_valid_json: File exists but is not valid JSON
errors.entries_must_be_list: entries must be a non-empty list
errors.each_term_must_be_object: Each term must be an object
errors.term_field_required: term field is required and cannot be empty
errors.locales_path_missing: Project is missing locales path or source language
errors.cannot_generate_source_language: Cannot generate file for source language
